title: Why do my Pixel USB-C buds say "Sorry, I'm offline. I can't do that." when my phone is not offline?
content:
I have a OnePlus 6T and I just recently got the Pixel USB-C buds and I love them. They're awesome. My only issue is about half the time when I use them and I tell Google to do something (i.e "What time is it?", or a Google search) it says "Sorry, I'm offline. I can't do that." even though my phone would have full WiFi connection or LTE+.

This is extremely annoying because I purchased the earbuds mostly for this feature and it doesn't even work half of the time. I would greatly appreciate if someone can help me out.

OS: Android 9.0, Jan. 2019 Security Patch
